about_the_game:
In Monster Chef, your kitchen is the battlefield! Play as Pranzo, a chef-warrior who hunts monsters and cooks them on the sport using your Chef Weapons. In this roguelite hack-and-slash, battle cute but fierce enemies, explore a procedurally generated world, and build your outstanding inn. Expand your culinary skills and discover Italian recipes! Sharpen your blade, fire up your salt shaker -dinner is served!

Hunt, fight and cook monsters right on the battlefield using your Chef Weapons. Season them with Spices in real-time combat and create gourmet dishes with a fast-paced hack & slash system that blends intense action and high-level cuisine.

Complete the daily order and serve a diverse clientele of fantasy tribes—elves, orcs, merfolk, and humans—each with unique tastes and requests. Upgrade your inn with stunning furniture and transform it from a humble shack into a prestigious five-star tavern!

Explore the ever-changing lands of Delizia, an open world with a procedurally generated map, where every day brings a new adventure.

Impress the rulers of Delizia by preparing grand feasts from the giant bosses you defeat. Unlock new biomes, each teeming with fresh monsters and challenges. Meet a diverse cast of characters, each with their own unique story and personality. Build friendships, offer help when you can, and uncover hidden secrets through exclusive dialogues.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 or equivalent
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3240 (2 * 3400) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 Ti (1024 MB) or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL compatible sound card
  • VR Support: Not compatible with VR devices
